caption.title: Seroconversion in DF patients detected by SD Bioline Dengue Duo IgM test and Panbio μ-capture ELISA.
caption.p: For 35 patients (A) both an acute phase serum sample (S1) and a follow-up sample taken during the convalescent phase (S2) were analyzed (B). Open/filled circles represent samples tested negative/positive in the SD Bioline Dengue Duo IgM test. Shaded areas represent index values rated as equivocal according to the respective manufacturer’s recommendations. (C) Subset of sample pairs with a DENV IgG IIFT negative S1 sample, ( D) Subset of sample pairs with a DENV IgG IIFT positive S1 sample. (E) Tabular summary of results. *: p < 0.05, ns: not significant.
